name: function-stability-api
description: Generate an image using stable diffusion AI

scripts.deploy-functions:dev: gcloud functions deploy stability-api-test --trigger-http --runtime=python38 --gen2 --entry-point generate_image --env-vars-file env/TEST.yaml
scripts.deploy-functions:prod: gcloud functions deploy stability-api --trigger-http --runtime=python38 --gen2 --entry-point generate_image --env-vars-file env/PROD.yaml

author: Emilio Villante
